ProductData.DataName: CrIS IR Ozone IP Product Profile

Datum.Description: Number of retrievals for this granule
Field of Regard Number (1-120) Note that FOR 1-30 = scan 1, FOR 31-60 = scan 2, FOR 61-90 = scan 3, FOR 91-120 = scan 4
Pressure levels for the ozone retrieval
Chi Square value from joint IR-microwave radiance matching retrieval
Chi Square value from microwave radiance matching - stage1
Chi Square value from microwave radiance matching retrieval - stage2

(Indicates quality of retrieved ozone profile IP) Difference between ozone absorption radiance and the background radiance. This is a quality flag that indicates the strength of the IR ozone signal in the CrIS spectrum.

ProductData.DataName: CrIS IR Ozone IP Product Profile - Quality Flags

Datum.Description: Combined IR+MW retrieval did not converge
Microwave only retrieval did not converge
Difference between MW+IR temperature profile minus MW only temperature profile exceeds threshold
Rain Flag: Precipitation detected within the FOR exceeding 2 mm/hr
Retrieval Cell Size (Number of FOVs used for this retrieval)
Temperature out of range: Atmospheric temperature at one or more of the pressure levels, or the surface skin temperature, is out of the expected range.
